{{ pokemon.name }}

  • {{ value.type.name }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { filter } from 'rxjs'; import { PokeApiService } from 'src/app/service/poke-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-poke-list', templateUrl: './poke-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./poke-list.component.scss'], }) export class PokeListComponent { constructor(private pokeApiService: PokeApiService) {} public getAllPokemons: any; private setAllPokemons: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.pokeApiService.apiListAllPokemons.subscribe((res) => { this.setAllPokemons = res.results; this.getAllPokemons = setAllPokemons; }); } public getSearch(value: string) { const filter = this.getAllPokemons.filter((res: any) => { return !res.name.indexOf(value.toLowerCase()); }); this.getAllPokemons = filter; } }
